servers.description: MAT server logs with mixed encodings
z/OS EBCDIC logs - converted using: iconv -f IBM-1047 -t ISO8859-1

_exclusion_comment: Patterns to filter out false positives (successful operations that contain error-like text)
_criticalPatterns_comment: Additional patterns for CRITICAL severity. Built-in patterns detect: OutOfMemory, deadlocks, system crashes, security breaches. Leave empty to use only built-in patterns.

customRules._comment: Example custom rule - uncomment to use

_customRules_comment: Define custom detection rules with pattern, severity (CRITICAL/EXCEPTION/ERROR/WARNING), issueType, and optional extractGroup for message extraction.
_context_comment: Number of log lines to capture before/after detected issues for better context
_dedup_comment: When enabled, similar issues within 5 seconds are deduplicated to prevent flooding
_json_comment: When enabled, automatically parses JSON-formatted log lines and extracts level, message, and stacktrace fields
_maxIssuesDisplayed_comment: Set to 0 for unlimited issues. Set a positive number to limit memory usage.
_databasePath_comment: Path to H2 database file (without .mv.db extension). Relative paths are resolved from the JAR file's directory. Use absolute path like '/var/data/sentinel/db' to store elsewhere.
_admin_comment: Admin credentials for infrastructure management (Servers/VMs) and configuration changes. Change these to secure values before deployment.
